tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are so fortunate to get doctor like Suvarna madam as first of all doctor could connect to us well in our concern, listened to our issue completely as we were so worried that my son had 104 degree temperature for almost 2days as we were thinking it could be a sign of dengue but doctor asked most important questions to us like how is his intake, how is activities, whether he is active or not, etc we answered to all the questions then Doctor Suvarna madam suggested us to wait for one more day as he is completely alright no need to worry. Doctor Suvarna madam could gave us complete clarity and confidence to us that it's not dengue pls rest be assured no need to go for any tests. We were so impressed with madam advice as it was so helpful for us to take further action being parents and also suggested us not to go for any antibiotics that really talks about doctor involvement with the patient.We highly impressed with Doctor Suvarna madam and we suggested to our neighbours, relatives & friends about madam. We thank once again Doctor Suvarna madam for guiding us in right direction as madam diagnosed our son correctly.Thank you madam once again.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

review: I spoke with Dr. Suvarna today as my baby was suffering with running nose and cough for the past 5 days. The doctor was very patient in listening to my problems and addressed my concerns very well. She did not rush through the appointment and was very polite in answering my questions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is a blessing for our son. We are fortunate that in my pregnancy delivery unit Dr suvarna was one of the fellow Dr for pediatrician care for my baby. She is amazing. My kid is so safe and secure from birth because of her. She is so humble and nice, for every question she reply very politely. We can't imagine any other doctor apart from her for our son. Please visit her for any children related query, *** ** ***** 100% recommended.

review: Dr. Zaka is so awesome and very friendly with me and my child..When you'll talk with her you feel very comfortable with her , I would recommend her to other parents for their children to come and see for any medical issues , regular checkup or Vaccination whatever they need. *** ** *** **** *************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Suvarna is a really sweet doctor. She listens to all the problems first and only then prescribe medication. She makes sure that the patient goes back happily and the clinic is very neat and clean. Would definitely recommend her for any pediatric related issues or problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: she is very patient , most importantly listens to what we say . as my kid is autistic, she can't communicate too, I have seen doctor who sees us like different creatures . but she understood my kids condition and handled her so patiently. she suggested what needs to be done and also what needs to be done if any emergency situation comes. that is something really gud. very gud she is .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Clinic is situated near to main road and it is very cool and calm place. Doctor enquired about all the complaints and explained us in detail. She is very friendly and not at all in hurry. I feel she is very budget friendly doctor and would recommend her services
